text: Ej kasone, ki ʙa Alloh va rasulas imon ovardaed, ʙo mardume, ki Alloh ʙar onho xasm giriftaast, dusti makuned. Inho ʙa saʙaʙi kufrason az rahmati Alloh va savoʙi oxirat noumed sudand, hamcunon ki on kofirone, ki dar gur xufta az haqiqati kor voqif sudand va ʙo ilmi jaqin donistand, ki az savoʙi oxirat noumed hastand
